name: BS Dragon Quest
summary: BS Dragon Quest is a version of Dragon Quest released for the Super Famicom add-on peripheral Satellaview, via broadcast, in Japan. It was divided in chapters, that could be playable only for an hour, and consisted of four one-hour scenarios which players would download on a weekly schedule. It consists of four stories: "導入 (Introduction)", "ダンジョン特集 (Dungeons Collection)", "フィールド特集 (Field Collection)", "フィナーレ (Finale)". Players were tasked with leveling their character, collecting medals and completing scenario-specific conditions with special events designed to occur under specific conditions in real-time. It was compatible with the SoundLink add-on.
